pkgmetadata.longdescription: Empirical Small Telescopes Analysis // We provide functions to perform an empirical small telescopes analysis. This package contains 2 functions, SmallTelescopes() and EstimatePower(). Users only need to call SmallTelescopes() to conduct the analysis. For more information on small telescopes analysis see Uri Simonsohn (2015) doi:10.1177/0956797614567341.
